results.p: The slash is a slanting line punctuation mark /. It is also known as a stroke, a solidus, a forward slash and several other historical or technical names.

results.p: Feb 14, 2022 — A forward slash, often just called a slash, is a punctuation mark with several different uses in writing. It resembles a slanted line tilted toward the right.

results.t: How to Use Slashes in Writing
results.p: Jan 14, 2021 — A slash can show a line break in a poem, song, or play, usually if several short lines are being written together on one long line.

The backward slash symbol "\" is primarily used in computing and programming as an escape character.

results.t: Slash Symbol - Meaning, Definition, Types, Usage and ...
results.p: Jul 31, 2023 — A slash is a diagonal line often used as a substitute for the conjunction 'or'. It signifies the availability of multiple options or choices.
